code: import axios from"axios";var API_BASE_URL="http://localhost:9090";export function getAllEmployees(){return axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees"));}export function createEmployee(employee){return axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees"),employee);}export function getEmployeeById(id){return axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees/").concat(id));}export function getEmployeeByFirstNameOrLastName(empName){return axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees/search?query=").concat(empName));}export function updateEmployee(id,employee){return axios.put("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees/").concat(id),employee);}export function deleteEmployee(id){return axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/employees/").concat(id));}
